com.thesonofthom.maps

Class PngFileMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thesonofthom.tools.Buffer
      • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap
        • com.thesonofthom.maps.PngFileMap

  • public class PngFileMap
extends BufferMap
    Map to easily parse the PNG file format. See the following for details on the structure of a PNG file:
    • http://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#5Chunk-layout
    • http://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#11Chunks
    • http://www.w3.org/TR/PNG-Chunks.html
    • https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portable_Network_Graphics#Technical_details
    Author:
    Kevin Thomson

    • Method Detail

      • buildPngFileMap

        public static PngFileMap buildPngFileMap(java.io.File file)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        builds a PngFileMap that parses the input file. Will first only read the necessary amount of data to determine if the file is in fact a PNG before reading the rest of the file
        Parameters:
        file - file to parse
        Returns:
        a PngFileMap object if the file is in fact a png
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file could not be read
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file is not a png file
